oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A lion springs up and bites a giraffe who falls on the lion and kills it. 1) p.322v: an insert (pasted in) featuring |xam words which have not been translated, 2) This story is found in Book I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The lion and the giraffe
